test_spi_mosi.help: SPI MOSI pin of the L3GD20. It should be used for library tests only

test_spi_miso.help: SPI MISO pin of the L3GD20. It should be used for library tests only

test_spi_sclk.help: SPI SCLK pin of the L3GD20. It should be used for library tests only

test_spi_cs.help: SPI CS of the L3GD20. It should be used for library tests only

test_drdy.help: DYDY pin of the L3GD20. It should be used for library tests only
